actions.name: Tactical Retreat

cost.trigger: The user gains a negative [Stage Change] effect and the user meets the [Desperation 1/2] Condition.

actions.description:
Trigger: The user gains a negative [Stage Change] effect and the user meets the [Desperation 1/2] Condition.

Effect: The user freely Moves up to half of a Movement Score of their choice, and freely attacks a valid target with Parting Shot.

actions.name: Parting Shot
actions.description: Effect: On hit, the target's ATK and SPATK Stages are reduced by -1 for 5 Activations. The user may then freely move themselves up to half of the Movement Score of their choice away from the target. If the user is an owned Pokémon, they may then immediately be returned their Poké Ball and another Pokémon may immediately be sent out in their place.
